Type RuntimeHelpers

Namespace Microsoft.FSharp.Core.CompilerServices

A group of functions used as part of the compiled representation of F# sequence expressions.

Methods

  • CreateEvent<TDelegate, TArgs>
  • EnumerateFromFunctions<T, TResult>
  • EnumerateThenFinally<T>
  • EnumerateUsing<T, TCollection, TResult>
  • EnumerateWhile<T>

Public static methods

IEvent<TDelegate, TArgs> CreateEvent<TDelegate, TArgs>(FSharpFunc<T, TResult> addHandler, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> removeHandler, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> createHandler)

Creates an anonymous event with the given handlers.
Parameters
FSharpFunc<T, TResult> addHandler

A function to handle adding a delegate for the event to trigger.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> removeHandler

A function to handle removing a delegate that the event triggers.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> createHandler

A function to produce the delegate type the event can trigger.

Return
IEvent<TDelegate, TArgs>

The initialized event.

IEnumerable<TResult> EnumerateFromFunctions<T, TResult>(FSharpFunc<T, TResult> create, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> moveNext, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> current)

The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the compiler-intrinsic conversions from untyped System.Collections.IEnumerable sequences to typed sequences.
Parameters
FSharpFunc<T, TResult> create

An initializer function.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> moveNext

A function to iterate and test if end of sequence is reached.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> current

A function to retrieve the current element.

Return
IEnumerable<TResult>

The resulting typed sequence.

IEnumerable<T> EnumerateThenFinally<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> compensation)

The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the try/finally operator for F# sequence expressions.
Parameters
IEnumerable<T> source

The input sequence.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> compensation

A computation to be included in an enumerator's Dispose method.

Return
IEnumerable<T>

The result sequence.

IEnumerable<TResult> EnumerateUsing<T, TCollection, TResult>(T resource, FSharpFunc<T, TResult> source)

The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the use operator for F# sequence expressions.
Parameters
T resource

The resource to be used and disposed.

FSharpFunc<T, TResult> source

The input sequence.

Return
IEnumerable<TResult>

The result sequence.

IEnumerable<T> EnumerateWhile<T>(FSharpFunc<T, TResult> guard, IEnumerable<T> source)

The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the while operator for F# sequence expressions.
Parameters
FSharpFunc<T, TResult> guard

A function that indicates whether iteration should continue.

IEnumerable<T> source

The input sequence.

Return
IEnumerable<T>

The result sequence.
